comment: If the option 'Save to SD card' in the stock camera app is turned on, every picture I take is rotated 90 degrees to the left when I view it. If I press on the preview really quick after taking a picture I see the image with correct orientation and the text 'Processing photo' for a short moment. After that the image is rotated. The thumbnail in the gallery app shows the picture upright, but when I open it to show full screen, the image automatically rotates to the left again.
scenarios: Taking a picture with the 'Save to SD card' option turned on results in the image being rotated 90 degrees to the left when viewed in full screen.
Seeing the correct orientation briefly with the text 'Processing photo' after pressing the preview quickly after taking a picture.
Viewing the thumbnail in the gallery app shows the picture upright, but it rotates to the left when opened in full screen.
key sentence: Viewing the thumbnail in the gallery app shows the picture upright, but it rotates to the left when opened in full screen.
